name: ERR Vids
author: ProPXLS

sections.description:
This plugin provides shortcode that takes in typical ERR url and parses out video. Video is then display on your page.

ERR itself don’t have and embeded or share code so you could display their videos on your site.

Each video is a single shortcode.
sections.installation:
Install it like any other plugin.

  1. Upload errvids.zip content to the /wp-content/plugins/ directory or use the automatic installation option
  2. Activate the plugin through the ‘Plugins’ menu in WordPress
  3. Place [errvid url="http://err_video_original_url_goes_here"] shortcode in your page or post content where you like to display ERR video.

short_description: Display ERR (Eesti Rahvusringh채채ling) videos on your website with ease.
